description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. Partyboat is a party on a boat! In this comedic sandbox simulator take on the persona of The Skipper - a retired, amoral divorcé who must sail, manage, design, gamble, steal, hire, fire, and event-coordinate the way from his sailboat to a cruise ship. It is presented as a unique blend of 2D animation, 3D renders, live action, lots of hilarious dialogue, and over 80 minutes of music!
description.short: Partyboat is a party on a boat! In this comedic sandbox simulator take on the persona of The Skipper - a retired, amoral divorcé who must sail, manage, design, gamble, steal, hire, fire, and event-coordinate the way from his sailboat to a cruise ship. It is presented as a unique blend of 2D animation, 3D renders, live action, lots of hilarious dialogue, and over 80 minutes of music!
